summary:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!WARNING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
THIS MAKES SHOUTS HAVE NO RECOVERY TIME!!!
descriptionHtml:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!WARNING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
THIS MAKES SHOUTS HAVE NO RECOVERY TIME!!!

This mod makes shouts have no recovery time.
I believe I have done all of the obtainable shouts (Fus Ro Dah etc.)
But, if you would like me to try to make custom shouts, I can look into it! :D
But, as this is my first Skyrim mod, so I\'m trying to keep it simple!
author: willyb321
